name: Curivari - Seleccion Privada - Robustos
additionalNotes: Curivari took the industry by storm in 2011 with their rich Nicaraguan blends made to emulate those Cuban greats, and the Seleccion Privada fits perfectly in that top-rated portfolio. These gems are offered in eight different popular sizes and are crafted with finely aged Nicaraguan long filler and binder tobaccos draped in a top-shelf Nicaraguan wrapper with either a rosado or maduro hue. The Curivari Seleccion Privada is an all Nicaraguan puro with the perfect balance of strength and flavor. These medium-bodied smokes contain notes of wood with a touch of vanilla and sweetness on the finish.
